pages.text: $(li)The Sweeping Edge enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the damage inflicted by Sweeping Attacks.
pages.title: Sweeping Edge

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_sweeping_edge)Ancient Tome (Sweeping Edge)$(/l).
